title: Schedule Settings
subtitle: Configure work patterns and rules to create optimal schedules.

patterns.title: Select Work Pattern
patterns.description: Choose a pattern that matches your team's work style. Schedules will be automatically generated based on the selected pattern.

5day.name: 5-Day Work
5day.description: 5 days on, 2 days off per week

4day.name: 4-Day Work
4day.description: 4 days on, 3 days off per week

rules.title: Configure Work Rules
rules.description: Set work rules according to legal requirements and team policies. These rules will be automatically applied during schedule generation.

preferences.autoBalanceDesc: Distribute work hours fairly among all staff
preferences.weekendRotationDesc: Rotate weekend shifts among all staff members
